header.title: OnBeat - Home
header.description: OnBeat is a simple music bot for Discord. With an advanced, yet simple to use dashboard, OnBeat is extremely easy to modify and control.

section1.2: Play high quality music in your Discord server for free

section2.1_1: With an advanced, yet simple to use bot, OnBeat is extremely easy to modify and control.
section2.2: Add the bot, and control server based music easily.
section2.2_1: All you have to do is select the server.
section2.3_1: You can interact with the site's player and take control of the music from any device.

section3.sectionTitle: Check out some of the things we have:
section3.2: We stream using Spotify rather than YouTube or Soundcloud.
